title: Lead Software Developer
activities: Responsible for conceiving and developing software solutions based on Typescript, React, NodeJS, PostgreSQL, Java, APEX
Conception and implementation of the provision of software solutions based on a serverless architecture including CI/CD pipeline
Support in the introduction and administration of Salesforce as well as implementation of extensions based on LWC, LWR, Apex, and Visualforce
Support in the conception and responsibility for the implementation of business processes in Salesforce using APEX and Flow Builder
Integration of a Salesforce system into a SAP PI PO partner network and provision of various REST APIs
Introduction of agile project management based on SCRUM
Administration and maintenance of GIT repositories and Linux servers
Code reviews and guidance of interns and student workers
Development and conduct of internal trainings and workshops (e.g. on Git, test frameworks, agile project management)

title: Junior Software Developer
activities: Fullstack development in the languages: Typescript/NodeJS/VueJS, PHP, Java, APEX
Integration, administration, and maintenance of MySQL databases
Administration and maintenance of Git repositories
Code reviews and participation in release and development management
Independent rollout of hotfixes and smaller releases
Participation in and partial leadership of Scrum meetings
Independent coordination and implementation of development sub-projects in cross-functional projects
Support and guidance of interns and student workers
